title: Broad fix for SecurityException when deleting emails. On Android 4.3, by default…
message:
Broad fix for SecurityException when deleting emails. On Android 4.3, by default exported=false for providers instead of true before. Only recent version of K-9 Mail have it

See
  . http://stackoverflow.com/questions/18847302/securityexception-permission-denial-opening-provider
  . https://github.com/k9mail/k-9/commit/06ae2a071b80b063ae4eafb635d6f8df728d4d6d

title: Bug fix for crash #9. Delete async task must be created on the UI thread.
message: Bug fix for crash #9. Delete async task must be created on the UI thread.

title: . Log level clean up
message:
. Log level clean up
. Minor thread optimization
  . Only start EmailNotification thread to auto close activity when needed (dup of service thread in lots of cases)
  . Notify EmailNotification thread to stop when activity is closed manually
